utils.align_Planes_bfgs(plane1, plane2)[source]¶

rotates two planes so that they are parallel to each other. Uses bfgs to find optimal yaw, pitch and roll angle that minimizes the distance between the normal of plane1 and the rotated normal of plane2

Parameters

  • plane1 (skspatial.objects.plane.Plane) -- reference plane

  • plane2 (plane to be rotated) -- skspatial.objects.plane.Plane

Returns

rotation matrix mapping plane2 onto plane1

Return type

jnp.array

utils.eval_distance(points, dist)[source]¶

finds the value of the scalar field dist with support [0,dist.shape[0]] imes[0,dist.shape[1]] imes[0,dist.shape[1]]

Parameters

  • points -- np.array [N,3] list of points wwhere the scalar field given by dist needs to be evaluated

  • dist -- scalar array with support [0,dist.shape[0]] imes[0,dist.shape[1]] imes[0, dist.shape[1]] np.array size [Nx,Ny,Nz]

Returns

array of values [N]

utils.jax_rotation_matrix3d(yaw_angle, pitch_angle, roll_angle)[source]¶

Build a 3d rotation matrix see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki /Rotation_matrix in_three_dimensions

Parameters

  • yaw_angle (float scalar) -- z-axis rotation angle:param yaw_angle:

  • pitch_angle (float scalar) -- y-axis rotation angle

  • roll_angle (float scalar) -- z-axis rotation angle

Returns

Return type
